sections.summary:
To secure a position related to the personal care of clients hair, skin, and nails, and continue my education at the post secondary level towards
additional certifications and /or an advance degree.

Hair coloring temporary semi permanent and permanent
Strong communication skills
Make-up application
Styling Techniques

Infection control sanitation procedures

Facial waxing
Sales background
permanent waving chemical relaxing
Outstanding client care
shaping hair with shears razors clippers
Superior attention to detail
Accomplishments
Consistently received positive performance reviews from guests on online rating sites.
